attributes.action: Legislate for long mandatory sentences for POSESSION of guns or knives and life sentences for USING, or threatening to use them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There needs to be an absolute deterrent to the posesssion and carrying of guns and knives (e.g. ten years with no remission) and mandatory life sentences for those who use a gun or knife to kill, injure or threaten. This should be accompanied by a campaign (e.g. "Real Men don't need guns")to nullify the culture of weapons as fashion accessories.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
